https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7KxxSF9f4EbXTENQg8A7RR5xWCu.jpg When a group of college kids stumble upon a small abandoned town of Sunset Valley, they must fight a band of Zombies led by a Confederate soldier seeking retribution for his grisly execution. Death Valley: The Revenge of Bloody Bill
